#summary Built-in vector data type

|| Type in OpenCL Language || API type for application ||
|| charn || cl_charn ||
|| ucharn || cl_ucharn ||
|| short n || cl_shortn ||
|| ushortn || cl_ushortn ||
|| intn || cl_intn ||
|| uintn || cl_uintn ||
|| longn || cl_longn ||
|| ulongn || cl_ulongn ||
|| floatn || cl_floatn ||

Supported values of n are 2, 4, 8, and 16.
